meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive John Henning Schumann Nicole Cocklin Francesco Caporusso Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7882.

td.p: John Henning Schumann, a physician from Tulsa, Oklahoma
Nicole Cocklin, a travel agent from Fort Wayne, Indiana
Francesco Caporusso, a technical support analyst from Lititz, Pennsylvania (whose 1-day cash winnings total $24,801)

tr.td: MY 2018 GOVERNMENT JOB
WORD ORIGINS
AT THE SALAD BAR
THE BIG BATTALIONS
WEST VIRGINIA
THERE IS A SANTA CLAUS
